column1: Experienced data scientist skilled in Python, SQL, and machine learning. Built predictive models and analyzed big data.
Handled recruitment, onboarding, and employee grievance redressal. Proficient in payroll and HRMS software.
Developed full-stack applications using React.js and Node.js. Experienced with REST APIs and cloud deployments.
Managed training sessions and learning plans for new employees. Strong in HR coordination and compliance.
Worked on natural language processing projects. Built classifiers and recommendation systems using TensorFlow.
Designed deep learning systems with PyTorch for image recognition. Deployed NLP models using HuggingFace transformers.
Implemented dynamic user interfaces using Vue and React. Focused on responsive design and accessibility.
Led software teams in Agile sprints. Oversaw product timelines and coordinated releases.
